settingsModal.disclaimer: Adjust only if you are familiar with these terms

composer.holdMessage: I will hold on to this for you

chatMessage.modelOccupied: The model appears to be occupied at the moment. Kindly select GPT-3.5 Turbo, or give it another go by selecting Run again from the message menu.
chatMessage.unauthorizedApiKey: Your API key appears to be unauthorized for  'this model'. You can change to GPT-3.5 Turbo and simultaneously request access to the desired model.
chatMessage.contextExceeded: This thread surpasses the maximum size allowed for this model. Please consider removing some earlier messages from the conversation, start a new conversation, choose a model with larger context, or submit a shorter new message.
chatMessage.invalidApiKey: The API key appears to not be correct or to have expired. Please check your API key and update it in the Settings menu.

models.missingApiKey: [Issue] missing OpenAI API Key. Add it on the client side (Settings icon) or server side (your deployment).

streamChat.missingApiKey: [Issue] missing OpenAI API Key. Add it on the client side (Settings icon) or server side (your deployment).
